Package io.pmem.pmemkv

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Converter<T>
    Helper interface, which provides functionality of storing objects of any type as ByteBuffer inside the pmemkv datastore.
    KeyCallback<KeyT>
    Represents callback function, which handle key-only use cases.
    KeyValueCallback<KeyT,ValueT>
    Represents callback function, which handle key/value use cases.
    ValueCallback<ValueT>
    Represents callback function, which handle value-only use cases.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ByteBufferConverter
    Impementation of Converter interface for ByteBuffer type
    Database<K,V>
    Main Java binding pmemkv class, which is a local/embedded key-value datastore optimized for persistent memory.
    Database.Builder<K,V>
    Builder is used to build instances of pmemkv Database class.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    BuilderException
    Pmemkv database configuration failed.
    DatabaseException
    DatabaseException is the superclass of all exceptions that can be thrown when handling pmemkv errors.
    InvalidArgumentException
    Argument passed to the function has a wrong value.
    NotFoundException
    Database entry or config item not found.
    NotSupportedException
    Function is not implemented by the current engine.
    OutOfMemoryException
    Operation failed because there is not enough memory (or space on the device).
    StoppedByCallbackException
    Callback function aborted.
    TransactionScopeException
    An error with the scope of the libpmemobj transaction.
    WrongEngineNameException
    Engine name does not match any available engine.
